synopsis.text: Detectives and thieves with extraordinary abilities known as 'Toys' once dominated an era, but now, it's the age of idols. In Yokohama, a mysterious song thief is causing chaos, targeting even the renowned super idol, Marine Amagi. Her chart-topping hit, 'Kiseki no Uta', has been stolen, leaving her fans devastated. Determined to recover her song, Marine turns to the skilled detectives of Milky Holmes for help. Can they unravel the mystery behind the stolen songs and restore the music to its rightful owners? Join the Milky Holmes team as they embark on a thrilling investigation in the world of idols and extraordinary abilities.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
